text: Crescent Hill is an unincorporated community in Bates County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Crescent Hill was established in 1858 and remained in operation until 1880. The community was named for its lofty elevation atop Crescent Hill. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Bates County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Crescent Hill, Missouri
